website_summaries.verdict: This remarkably inexpensive model is perfect for those looking to save a few dollars in their range hood purchase.
pros: Available for purchase in various sizes and colors
Offers filtration system to rid area of smoke and odors
cons: Non-ducted design cannot offer outside venting

customer_reviews.title: FITS PERFECT in my Tiny House!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS! IT's painfully difficult to find a stainless steel range hood that is 24" AND vents inside! This thing is AMAZING in my tiny house, HIGHLY recommend- it was SOOO easy to install, and it's light weight- very powerful- and I definitely use it as a shelf, which I didn't intend to, and it's probably not made for it, but in a tiny house- the next thing I knew, I had all my spiced, oils, vinegar, sugar etc, so conveniently sitting on it as a shelf, and it holds it without hesitation. Can't say enough good things about this unit! You wont be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Works great, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, looks great. Only thing I don't like is there's no undercarriage covering the ugly interior, but that's not the product's fault, that's my budgets fault so I still gave it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: SAHM

customer_reviews.title: Damaged in an undamaged box.
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and was expecting a minor dent in the range hood at most. What I didn’t expect was this straight out the box. The box was in perfect condition, so it baffles me why it looks like this. I’m undecided if I want a replacement just for the same thing to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive hood.
customer_reviews.text: Hood is quiet. It is very attractive. The wiring is easy to install. I’m a 71 year old female, and I installed it, including the wiring myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't appear to last
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this in Nov 2018 to avoid cutting up new cabinets for the old vented system. We don't use a range hood much (a handful of times a year) so we thought this would be a good option to the aforementioned issue. It's mostly for light purposes. However 2 nights ago when we turned it on the high speed it was barely running. On low speed it is so quiet I doubt it is working at all. Unfortunately our 1 year warranty is now expired. Truly a shame that a product of this expense (vented systems are much cheaper) doesn't last much over a year with extremely minimal use.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly W.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't filter smoke
customer_reviews.text: Inexperience, I suppose, led me to buy this Ductless range hood, that and the reviews that implied that it did more than just act as a noisy light over my stove. Half of the smoke/steam..etc.. rolls right past the filter and out into the room and what does get sucked into the filter comes right back out the top, still stinky and smokey. Useless as a filter. The light is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Brad_S

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Upgraded with our new stove and so happy with it. Fraction of cost at stores and does just what we need it to do! Easy installation!
customer_reviews.author: alisha

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice unit. It fit perfectly into our 36" opening above our range. It was very east to wire up and install. It looks and works great. Probably not the best fan suction power, but for the price, it works just fine for us.
customer_reviews.author: JMD

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but doesn't perform,
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty good under my cabinets. It will protect them from oil and what not coming from cooking on the stove. I was really disappointed in the lack of suction and the small single filter. I expected it wouldn't more air like ducted unit but with only one small filter and fan it really doesn't do much at all. Hopefully I can return this and get a deluxe model.
customer_reviews.author: justchil

customer_reviews.title: Lovin This...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 58 year old women and installed this myself after taking down the old one. Had to balance it on my head but it worked for me. Quiet, bright light and good looking. Price was great. It's also more lightweight than the older ones used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Nice, cheap hood for someone who doesn't need a lot
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how cheap (in price) this was. It's not a high dollar unit, however it was as easy as pie to put into a spot with an existing unit. If you can hook up basic electrical things... You'll have No issues with this. After its up it looks great. I didn't need high tech hood... Just something with a light and a fan. This fit the bill perfectly and for the right price. Happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: ENVYGRL8

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: i love it, it makes a difference in my kitchen and it’s easy to install if you know how to connect wires together so you have to be careful on that area but other than that it looks good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Install was easy, instructions were very good. Packaging was great. Very happy with this product and seller. Looks great in our kitchen. Fan is very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product for the price. Looks great easy to install, does an okay job pulling Steam and smoke off the cooktop. Could be a little quieter but I'm not going to complain for the price.
customer_reviews.author: D.D.

customer_reviews.title: Simple to install and works great.
customer_reviews.text: We were replacing our old vent hood and all we had to do was unpack this one and slide it right back in then connect the wires. We were done in 10 minutes. The fan is quiet and the light is bright.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Range Hood
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality as expected. Fit like a glove. Have someone hold it in place, 4 screws later, your done. Hard wire it. Great thing i like a lot is it uses a normal bulb. Fan not to loud either.
customer_reviews.author: pcdumy

customer_reviews.title: This was the best price I could find honestly and though it wasn't ...
customer_reviews.text: This was the best price I could find honestly and though it wasn't the easiest to install (we live in an older house) it still ended up looking so much better than the original and I like the clean, sleek look. Very modern.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Mom. It is so quiet, and what we love the most is ease of cleaning and the AWESOME lighting It looks amazing and I will be buying another when we do our kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Frugal Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Only has one light to illuminate your cooking surface.
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive! The vent works well but is a bit loud. The light has already needed to be replaced after 1 month because I leave it on all day & night.
customer_reviews.author: EBerry

customer_reviews.title: Simple
customer_reviews.text: Installing this product was 100% EASIER than removing my old one which was at least 40 years old. Yikes! Spend HOURS removing the old one, but only about 10 minutes installing this one. The price was great and the product works perfectly in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Memz

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel hood - Great choice.
customer_reviews.text: I moved into a house that did not have lighting above the stovetop. Purchased this unit and it is exactly what was needed. It provides great lighting and powerful exhaust pull. The price was great. I looked at many units.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra S. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Poor fan
customer_reviews.text: It looks great easy to install but the fan even on high will not vent very well. Needs a stronger fan. Steam and smoke will build up under the hood and cant be removed fast enough so it just rolls out from the front.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Janicki

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy No Refund
customer_reviews.text: Installed this and it has very poor flow/thrust in venting and now I find out I can't get a refund. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for an old Caloric one. It works fine for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Niemand

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel 24 inch nonducted range hood
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived well boxed and in excellent condition. Installation was straight forward and easy if you are handy. Some knowledge of electrical polarities is essential (black is hot and white is neutral, green is ground) A second person is necessary to hold the unit in order to locate mounting screws to underside of kitchen cabinets. The unit is performing well as designed. One minor difficulty is the precut through wiring knock-out is difficult to punch out.
customer_reviews.author: qwaldo

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: This range is really good, its very sturdy and nicely produced. I didn't think is was going to look as good as it did due to the price but I was very impressed. I had gotten the wrong size so I had to ship the first range back and the company I ordered it from were Fantastic. There was great communication with them and as soon as they received the product they gave me a full refund so I could purchase the correct one, they even refunded for the shipping (some companies don't do this). Over all Great experience...
customer_reviews.author: C. Juarez

customer_reviews.title: bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Great light and the exhaust works great also
customer_reviews.author: Jaci bateman

customer_reviews.title: I recommend well made vent hood
customer_reviews.text: You have to wire this its not a plug in type so be aware if your not savvy with electric. I'm happy with it well built fit flush to the bottom of the cabinet
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Riley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, to say the least.
customer_reviews.text: This hood is an exact duplicate for the one I used for 22 years. I know this will do the same for me because there are some slight improvement in the construction. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: El Hombre

customer_reviews.title: Functions decently and looks nice from the outside
customer_reviews.text: Functions decently and looks nice from the outside. Drawbacks are cheap plastic cover for light bulb (only encloses bulb 50%, I expect it to be covered in grease in a few months.) Also, the enclosure for the wiring isn't fully sealed, and is generally in travel path of stove exhaust, so this too will likely be grease-covered if I need to go in there for some reason. All this said, I only paid $75 overall which is pretty bottom-end price-wise for a range hood.
customer_reviews.author: WF

customer_reviews.title: Works great and good price
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this hood range and the price was very fair.
customer_reviews.author: BECKY M

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This item was perfect, as described and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Jammy D.

customer_reviews.title: Den didn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: The fan didn’t work and we had already installed it!
customer_reviews.author: Chicks

customer_reviews.title: Nice range hood
customer_reviews.text: The price was terrific and I love the simplicity of it. Very happy. Nicer that others I saw at Home Depot or Lowe's which were either the same price or higher than this one. It's also much quieter than the one I used to have.
customer_reviews.author: Briggie

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this exhaust vent. Good value for the money and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Nice range hood.
customer_reviews.text: Love this range hood. My old one vented out the back and in the winter the cold would come right in. Not anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Troy E.

customer_reviews.title: This worked fine in my rental property
customer_reviews.text: This worked fine in my rental property, price was right, fit perfectly and the light is great. Only problem was a small ding in the metal....which could have been prevented with better packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Hood Range
customer_reviews.text: I love how it looks in my kitchen. Matches my stove great. and looks wonderful with the new back splash which is black, silver and white. Easy to install took the guy about 30 minutes. Have told many people who have seen it where to get there own.
customer_reviews.author: kathy henderson

customer_reviews.title: Very good vent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really liked it and it fit perfectly where it needed to the only thing I don't like about it is it gets dirty grimy and you can see it plain as day
customer_reviews.author: A. Garland

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the reasonable price. Delivered quickly and arrived in perfect condition. Quality of the stainless steel not the best but that is true of many products out there. Replaced a 50 yr old brown hood--a definite improvement for the kitchen. installation easy with 4 screws. Since it was replacement, I already has the electricity for the fan and light.
customer_reviews.author: COUNTRY GIRL

customer_reviews.title: Can’t comment on dents because, didn’t see any packaged well
customer_reviews.text: Love the fast delivery, and packaged in two boxes with styrofoam. Waiting to have it installed, after work is finished in my kitchen , will send update of before and after. But love the look and stainless still finish. Came in July 2020
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t looking for a powerful hood , mostly interested in it for the light and for every now and then to help with cooking fumes . easy to install and looks great . Very happy With the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie G. Santos

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price! I searched all over for a rangehood this size and stainless but stores never stocked them. Only special order then had to wait 2-3 weeks for arrival got this one in 2 days almost half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. J

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Quiet and it works well when it come to removing smoke
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional value, same great quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks and works great, easy to install and the value is exceptional. Dont pay more at your local stores, this is every bit as good.
customer_reviews.author: E.King

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: We purchased for tenants apt and it was fairly easy to install, has a nice clean look, and works well. We have heard no complaints yet. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KDG

customer_reviews.title: Fit just right.
customer_reviews.text: Could not find this size locally. Looks nice, has a quiet fan, and was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Mr R A Vasichek

customer_reviews.title: Nice item
customer_reviews.text: I got what I paid. It's beautiful. It will be much greater if the fan can be more powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Harry King

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy. Had it installed and wired up in less than 30 minutes. Much quieter than the old vent hood.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: This works very well and looks good. When we renovate kitchen, I am going to get a ducted one though that vents outside because our smoke alarms still go off when cooking etc.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Leighton

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great for the money. Basically using this to modernize my kitchen while I’m saving up for a complete remodel.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Ductless Hood
customer_reviews.text: Fitted the 36" opening and everything went together without a hitch. Not as good as the one it replaced,...(35 years old with a charcoal filter too) but certainly adequate for our needs. Would appreciate a mounting template (since we're women and couldn't hold it up there very well). Arrived in perfect shape and very fast.
customer_reviews.author: chocsugaw

customer_reviews.title: Looks terrific and the price was right
customer_reviews.text: Looks terrific and the price was right. Nice to have it delivered to my door. But apparently some parts were missing. The guys that installed it looked all through the box but could find two parts needed to hook it up. One they bought at Home Depot but the other was specific to the produced. They made it work but I wonder what happened?
customer_reviews.author: Cindymindy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent as a light fixture, but don't expect much help with smoke
customer_reviews.text: I just installed this thing and turned it on. It has a flow rate of about a cubic inch per hour! I seriously doubt it would help much with a slightly burned piece of toast let alone that pot of sauce you left simmering on the stove 3 hours ago and forgot about.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade your old range hood with this
customer_reviews.text: Love this stainless steel range hood! Easy to install and an instant upgrade in my rentals.
customer_reviews.author: Tony N.

customer_reviews.title: Work well, quite and look expensive
customer_reviews.text: Work well, quite and very easy to install. Brought the stainless one to replace my old white unit. Look expensive.
customer_reviews.author: G-proteinbooks G-proteinbooks

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you purchase the right thing!
customer_reviews.text: Very unattractive. Part of it is my fault. I was not looking for a cheap one but the description was not very clear
customer_reviews.author: lulu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Inexpensive Range Vent
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect inexpensive stainless steel range vent for your home. You save about $75 - $100 compared to hardware store chains. Matches perfectly with the rest of the kitchen appliances. Took me about 15 minutes to install. The fan is pretty quiet compared to more expensive ranges.
customer_reviews.author: Robken Lingan

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, and is rather quiet
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a 25 year old fan with this one. Looks great, and is rather quiet, and the light is bright. Installation was easy (getting the old one out was cumbersome...it is a two person job).
customer_reviews.author: ESB

customer_reviews.title: thin metal, weighs less than half of the unit it replaced
customer_reviews.text: was sad to see how thin the stamped metal is for this over the stove fan.
customer_reviews.author: M.C

customer_reviews.title: Was expecting it work better in a kitchen without an exhaust pipe
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you buy the electrical cord as an extra because it doesn't come with it!
customer_reviews.author: Rad

customer_reviews.title: It worked perfect and looks great.Thanks, Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I wanted. Everything worked perfect and the installation was easy.. the delivery was on time and was in perfect shape..
customer_reviews.author: Gerald (Jerry) Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great job thanks
customer_reviews.text: It was great buy, wasn’t difficult to install, working as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: finding 36'' vent hood locally at a similar price of a 30'' was almost impossible. This was exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Restoration Crown

customer_reviews.title: Stove hood
customer_reviews.text: I like the product because I could get the exact size that I needed a 42 long perfect
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: User friendly
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install, works good and looks great
customer_reviews.author: kenny

customer_reviews.title: Happy to find a 42" wide hood
customer_reviews.text: Happy to find a 42" wide hood. The metal is thin and easy to dent but it does the job and the customer is happy.
customer_reviews.author: PJB

customer_reviews.title: Nice Stainless Steel Broan non-ducted Range Hood
customer_reviews.text: Great stainless steel hood for this price. Easy to install. Looks great with my Samsung stainless steel range.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Dan suction a little weak. Noise level as expected, loud. It's okay for the price. I will later upgrade to a ducted range hood. The fan is usually quieter
customer_reviews.author: Robert Locascio

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Works with my custom cabinet in a place that cannot be vented through the roof. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte HW

customer_reviews.title: How it came extra protected and wasn't damaged at all, I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love shopping with amazon. They always take care of me, this was exactly as described, it is quite and it also has a light bulb cover as well. 5 STARS ALL THE WAY.....
customer_reviews.author: Mary Sellers

customer_reviews.title: looks good, and by far a great value for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Installed it with no concerns, looks good, and by far a great value for the price. You could easily pay 5-6x this for a hood, but why? This does just what I needed. Handle gently though because I can see how it would be easily bent or scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Not as strong as some larger may be, but it's hard to find the 24 inch for smaller spaces. I love it. Installed in five minutes. Also bought a matching backsplash
customer_reviews.author: patricio m

customer_reviews.title: this one fit great. Light is good
customer_reviews.text: After not being able to find the correct hood in ANY hardware store, this one fit great. Light is good, fan is quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen M.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE LOOK
customer_reviews.text: This vent a hood looks great and fit my large opening. The fan could be stronger pulling out steam and smoke but it does a pretty good job
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Under cabinet range hood
customer_reviews.text: It has been fine so far. It looks very nice. The light is good.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Bokser

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement to my old hood will wait to see durability after several cleanings
customer_reviews.author: Jim k

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: The fan does what it should do and the light makes cooking so much easier! This fan is also an easy install. Glad we bought it verses a more expensive one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Cupp

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable price for the basic product
customer_reviews.text: NIce option for a reasonable price. Amazon was able to get it to me 2 weeks ahead of the big box stores!
customer_reviews.author: marmar

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: We have been very happy with our purchase of this hood. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: micah

customer_reviews.title: Looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Fills the gap over a 36" stove perfectly, quiet too.
customer_reviews.author: AZRM

customer_reviews.title: Amazing buy!
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for the buck! This thing looks 1,000 times better than the old one and was a quick 10 minute install! So so pleased with this!
customer_reviews.author: Momma M

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in great condition and was exactly as expected. Thanks for a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: ajfallon

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early before the expected arrival dates! Perfect condition- looks and works great! Fan both low and high very quiet. Very pleased!

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking, easy to hook up and mount!
customer_reviews.text: Fit great, dimensions were perfect. Looks really nice above our stainless Kenmore stove

customer_reviews.title: not as good as duckted but it does remove most kitchen smells
customer_reviews.text: not as good as duckted but it does remove most kitchen smells,
customer_reviews.author: David Gearhart

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, but easy installation.
customer_reviews.text: First the bad, it doesn't make sense to me to charge twice as much just because the range hood is stainless steel; the others have stainless steel, just painted over. The installation was pretty easy even though a plug in adapter was needed for this particular installation scenario.
customer_reviews.author: BOTTOM LINE

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, works well, priced great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for a rental home that I own and it works perfectly. It really looks nice in a newly remodeled kitchen and was relatively easy to install.

customer_reviews.title: Hood range
customer_reviews.text: It add great detail to my kitchen with the cooktop I lived the hood range thanks Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Best deal for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Best deal for the money. No big box stores, not even discount stores can compete with this price for the same product in Stainless Steel.

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, works as described. The punch out was hard to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome didn't realize it was ductless works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie O'Neill Snow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, and an easy install even for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, and an easy install even for a non-DIYer like me! Replaced an old beat up black hood to match a new SS stove.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Jamieson

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and works fine. Easy install. Don't expect amazing for the price. I guess it's loud, but I've never heard a quiet hood so I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: madnurse

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking; easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and looks great. It replaced a relic, a coppertone hood.
customer_reviews.author: LBell

customer_reviews.title: A nice cheap apartment grade hood
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was expecting it to be . A nice cheap apartment grade hood. Broan also makes much higher end more expensive ones but this fit the opening and was a replacement of a 20 year old unit that also was a cheap hood.
customer_reviews.author: Gritz

customer_reviews.title: fit perfect install was easy and only took 10 min
customer_reviews.text: fit perfect install was easy and only took 10 min. to put in. The light is nice and bright the fan quiet. Would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette C.

customer_reviews.title: great product, shipped fast
customer_reviews.text: this is a great hood for my small apartment. it vent heat straight up unlike my previous one that vented it straight over my head. love it easy to clean and maintain. recommend to anyone looking for one to get this model.
customer_reviews.author: krasydr

customer_reviews.title: Great little vent for the price;
customer_reviews.text: That being said, it could draw better , not too noisy on low, the finish looks good and came undamaged.The wires could be a little longer and the light cover is on the cheap side but for the price it is better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: tigger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product for the price. Easy to install for a non-vented hood. The only downside is that the unit is not "tall" meaning that the light fixture is easily seen below the lower rim. It bugs me a little bit but it's better than having an oversized hood.
customer_reviews.author: Master Organizer

product_meta.title: Broan-NuTone 413604 Non-Ducted Ductless Range Hood Insert with Light, Exhaust Fan for Under Cabinet, 36-Inch, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description:
Color:Stainless Steel| Size:36-Inch| Pattern Name:Range HoodUpgrade your kitchen with the Broan Ductless Range Hood Insert and Incandescent Light! This versatile insert is the perfect solution to your ventilation needs serving as both an exhaust fan and overhead light for your stove. The stainless steel unit is designed to fit neatly underneath your cabinets to provide quality airflow in your kitchen. It installs as a non-ducted range hood with a charcoal filter that effectively removes smoke and odors from your cook space. The protective lamp lens distributes light evenly over the cooktop and accepts up to 75W bulb (not included). It's designed with smooth surfaces that clean easily and quick-release filters that can go in the dishwasher. Install the insert at least 18" above cook top. The sides are mitered and the bottom edge hemmed, with no sharp edges for safety and good looks. The unit has a two-speed fan switch and separate light switch and the motor is permanently lubricated. For your convenience, this range hood can work in an ADA-compliant application and includes a 1 year limited . Enhance your home today with the Broan Ductless Range Hood Insert and Light!

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The 41000 series of non-ducted under cabinet hoods are made to exacting Broan standards, providing effective filtration, high quality and value. The range hood comes in a variety of appliance matching colors and widths, and includes a removable combination grease-charcoal filter for cleaner indoor exhaust recirculation, a fan designed for years of trouble free service, a protective lamp lens that distributes light evenly over the cook-top and control switches for fan speed and light activation. Installs as non-ducted only with charcoal filter. Accepts up to 75-Watt light (Bulb not included). This range hood can work in an ADA-compliant application.
feature_bullets: HIGH-QUALITY DUCTLESS RANGE HOOD INSERT: Stainless steel hood insert improves ventilation and lighting over your stove with the non-ducted filtration system that effectively removes smoke and odors
EFFECTIVE INCANDESCENT LIGHTING: A protective lamp lens distributes light evenly over the cook-top and accepts up to 75W bulb (bulb not included)
EASY CARE: Charcoal filter is replaceable so you can maintain optimum grease capture and keep the kitchen fresh
VERSATILE: Separate rocker switches control the light and the 2-speed fan for easy use.Rated Voltage:120
IDEAL SIZE: Range hood insert measures 36" and should be installed at least 18" above cook top
Installs as non-ducted only with charcoal filter
Polymeric blade and light lens accepts up to 75W bulb
Effective non-ducted filtration system removes smoke and odors
Mitered sides and hemmed bottom for safety and good looks
